meanings.definition: Large, bold graphics or designs, typically used in architecture or interior design.
meanings.sent1: The building had supergraphics on its walls, making it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The supergraphics on the wall added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The supergraphics on the floor made it look like a giant coloring book!
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was like a supergraphics poster, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The supergraphics on the billboard were so bright and eye-catching.

meanings.definition: A style of graphic design that emphasizes scale and impact.
meanings.sent1: The artist's supergraphics always made a strong impression on viewers.
meanings.sent2: Supergraphics are often used in advertising to grab people's attention.
meanings.sent3: The museum featured an exhibit showcasing supergraphics of famous landmarks.
meanings.sent4: His words were like supergraphics, leaving a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The supergraphics in the magazine were so vibrant and captivating.

meanings.definition: The use of oversized graphics to create a visual statement.
meanings.sent1: The company used supergraphics to make their brand memorable.
meanings.sent2: Supergraphics can transform a plain space into a visually striking environment.
meanings.sent3: The superhero movie had supergraphics that popped out of the screen!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like supergraphics, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The supergraphics in the park were so creative and engaging.
